Trinity Western University Admission Requirements, General Certificate of Education, Test /Curriculum, Minimum Score, How to apply.

Trinity Western University Admission is ongoing for all international interested candidates who want to apply. The admission requirements are listed below for all interested candidates.

Trinity Western University Admission Requirements

International Students Admission Requirements are as follows:

GENERAL CERTIFICATE OF EDUCATION

All Candidates must have standing in five subjects of which at least two ought to be taken at the basic level.

Students may be entitled to three semesters of credit for each higher-level course completed to a maximum of 12 semesters provided that a maximum grade of C is achieved in that course. Departments will agree on if the credit award is extensive or course-specific.

The following equivalents documents will be considered:

  1. School Certificate is required same as GCE with at least two passes at the major level of the Higher School Certificate.
  2. Official document of matriculation from standard universities.
  3. International Baccalaureate with at least two subjects at the advanced level.
  4. Other countries: write or email the Admissions Office for information.
  1. ENGLISH LANGUAGE APTITUDE REQUIREMENT FOR UNDERGRADUATE STUDENTS
  2. English is the language of instruction at Trinity Western University so all applicants must demonstrate English Language aptitude in both oral and written academic English.
  3. Here are the eight ways to meet TWU’s English Language Proficiency Requirement:
  4. Submit official TOEFL, IELTS, CAEL, or Duolingo exam results, meeting the admission necessity in the table below. Test results are legitimate for admission to TWU for two years. Tests taken ahead of the two years will not be legitimate for admittance. These results must be submitted at the time of application.
Test/Curriculum Minimum score 
TOEFL Test of English Foreign Language Internet-Based Test. To send TOEFL results directly to Trinity Western University and receive them more quickly, students should use code 0876. Overall Score: 88 with a minimum score of 21 in each of the four areas and a TWE of at least 5.
IELTS International English Language Testing System (Academic) Overall score: 6.5 with 6.0 on Writing Band
CAEL Canadian Academic English Language Assessment
Testing is offered at TWU’s Langley campus		 Overall score: 70
Duolingo English Test The Duolingo English Test is an online English proficiency test that can be taken online, on-demand, in under an hour. The test is taken via a computer with a camera and includes a proficiency score, video interview, and writing sample which are shared with Trinity Western University when you send your results. Certified results are available within 48 hours of the test session. Overall score 110+ with a minimum score of 95 on Literacy band
  1. The Trinity Western University has developed various pathways for Undergraduate students to study English at the University. Completion of these programs meets the English aptitude necessity. These programs include U1 (University Transition) at our Langley campus and TLC (Trinity Language Center) both at Langley and Richmond campuses. Students entering via TLC will be assessed for English skills during direction and students will be placed at the suitable level.
  2. Students must complete three successive years of full-time high school or post-secondary education in English within Canada or accepted countries immediately proceeding to enrolment at TWU.
  3. Complete four consecutive years of full-time high school in an accredited North-American or four consecutive years of full-time post-secondary education from a standard institution, where English is the major language of tuition (outside of approved countries) at once prior to entrance to TWU.
  4. Accomplish a final score of 4 or improved on the AP (Advanced Placement English Language and Composition or AP Literature & Composition.
  5. Achieve a final grade of 3 or better on the IB English 12 A1 or A2 (HL) or a final grade of 4 or better on the IB English 12 A1 or A2 (SL) or IB English 12 B with a grade of 4 or better.
  6. Achieve the last score of C or superior on the GCSE O-Level English Language-A.
  7. Achieve a final grade of B or higher in six credits of post-secondary studies in English courses in an approved English-speaking country equivalent to TWU ENG103 and TWU ENG 104. You can click on   for form filling Undergraduate

Applying to Trinity Western is a simple two-step process:

STEP 1: CREATE YOUR PROFILE

This portal is where you can complete your application, upload necessary credentials, and track your application’s arrangement. Make sure you record your login information to access the portal throughout your admissions journey,

STEP 2: COMPLETE YOUR APPLICATION
